content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's start the negotiation. I'll start with a price of 1000 Euros. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price, not additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I am willing to pay 800 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer of 800 Euros. Let's continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 850 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer of 850 Euros. Let's continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 900 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer of 900 Euros. Let's continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 950 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer of 950 Euros. Let's continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 980 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer of 980 Euros. Let's continue the negotiation.
